short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Freescripthost.com is the best free web hosting provider, absolutely free, with no ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Freescripthost the best free web hosting company. There are no hidden costs, no setup fees, no ads, and no restrictive terms for hosting your content. 

Plan Features:

- Unlimited disk space
- Unlimited Bandwidth
- Ability to choose free subdomains (*.host4free.net, *.hostingmyself.com, *.1hosters.com)
- Ability to host your own Domain.
- Unlimited Mail Boxes
- Unlimited Subdomains
- Unlimited FTP Accounts
- Unlimited Databases
- Unlimited Cron Jobs
- .htaccess support
- And more..

CPanel Features:

- PHP Version Switcher (5.2 , 5.3 or 5.4)
- Web SSH access
- Webmail Access
- Auto Installer
- Weekly Website Backups
- Free Website Templates
- Custom Error Pages
- And more..

Server Features:

- 4/7 Network Monitoring
- Courtesy Site Backups
- Generator Backup Power
- UPS Power Backup
- Optimized Apache Web Server
- Linux Operating System
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
- And more..

Plan Limits:

- FTP logins limit 7000 connections in a year.
- Email sending limit: 20 per minute.
- CPU limit: 20%.
- RAM limit:128 MB.
- Users can create 1 addon domain per 1 hour.
- .exe or .txt file extensions are not allowed.
- Max files uploaded (inodes) per account limits: 25000
- IP Connections Limit - 1200 per 5 min per IP.
- Max. execution time - 30 seconds.
- Post upload limit: 8 MB.
- max_updates limit is 25000 queries per hour
